title: Linux comm Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the powerful comm command in Linux, learn how to compare and contrast sorted files, and customize the output with various options. Enhance your text processing and editing skills.

meta.title: Linux comm Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the powerful comm command in Linux, learn how to compare and contrast sorted files, and customize the output with various options. Enhance your text processing and editing skills.
meta.keywords: Linux, comm command, file comparison, text processing, file editing, command-line tools

verify.hint: Verify that the comm command correctly identifies the unique and common lines between the two files.
